title: Choir wearing robes monogrammed CMS, with organist Jolene Green, soloist Norma Jean Humphries and choir director Daniel Moore in foreground, first row: Delores Humphries Ziegler, Mary Alice Humphries, Celeste Gordon Johnson, and Barbara Randall, second row: Ms. Patterson, Amy Humphries Stephenson, Minnie Hill, and Millie Lewis on right end, back row: possibly Willistene Hudson on right end, in Metropolitan Baptist Church
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
provenance_text: The Estate of Charles H. Harris, Pittsburgh
